Description.Text:
Property Location
Ibis Nice Centre Notre Dame is in the heart of Nice, walking distance from Basilique Notre Dame and Nice Etoile Shopping Center. This hotel is within close proximity of Marc Chagall National Museum and St. Roch Hospital.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 52 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 52 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Ibis Nice Centre Notre Dame is in the heart of Nice, walking distance from Basilique Notre Dame and Nice Etoile Shopping Center. This hotel is within close proximity of Marc Chagall National Museum and St. Roch Hospital.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Basilique Notre Dame - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Nice Etoile Shopping Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Marc Chagall National Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Roch Hospital - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Albert 1st Gardens - 1 km / 0.6 mi
La Tete au Carre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Nice Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Place Massena - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Verdure Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Orthodox Cathedral - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Courthouse Square - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Place Garibaldi - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Casino Ruhl - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Nice Acropolis Convention and Exhibition Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi

The preferred airport for ibis Nice Centre Notre Dame is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
